info.title: Class API
info.description:
### Retrieves information about classes and associated class sections.

The interactive docs below allow you to test parameter usage and see how both requests and return payloads are formatted using the **"Try it out"** feature.

*This feature runs against the UAT version of the API and the QAT version of the source SIS database. Remember to remove "/uat" from the URL to run your client against the production version.*

(Please note, XML responses do *NOT* include the outermost "payload" node shown in this documentation; "apiResponse" is the outermost node. The "payload" node exists, unnamed, *only* in JSON responses.)

tags.name: class
tags.description: resources dealing with groups of associated sections

page-number.name: page-number
page-number.description: The set of records to return; can be used to traverse paginated data sets.

page-size.name: page-size
page-size.description: The number of records returned in one paginated data set. Maximum is 100

app_id.name: app_id
app_id.description: The public ID portion of API Central credentials

app_key.name: app_key
app_key.description: The private key portion of API Central credentials

get.description:
Returns class data, consisting of the Student/Class EDO described on [bMeta.berkeley.edu](http://bMeta.berkeley.edu)
***Note:** At least one of cs-course-id or term-id query parameters is required.*

parameters.name: cs-course-id
parameters.description: The unique id for a canonical course in Campus Solutions

parameters.name: term-id
parameters.description: The ID uniquely identifying the term

parameters.name: session-id
parameters.description: The ID uniquely identifying a session within the term

parameters.name: subject-area-code
parameters.description: The area of academic inquiry, such as MATH or ENGLISH

parameters.name: catalog-number
parameters.description: The human-readable number identifying a class within a subject area, such as R1A

parameters.name: class-number
parameters.description: The index uniquely identifying the class among those with the specified subject area and catalog number

parameters.name: status-code
parameters.description: The code indicating whether the class is active or otherwise

parameters.name: enrollment-status-code
parameters.description: The code indicating whether the class is open for enrollment

parameters.name: waitlist-availability
parameters.description: Return only classes with at least one section having a waitlist, whether open or full

parameters.name: final-exam-code
parameters.description: The code indicating whether and what kind of final exam is required

parameters.name: instruction-mode-code
parameters.description: The code indicating whether the class is offered in-person or over the web

parameters.name: fees-exist
parameters.description: Whether the class requires any additional fees

parameters.name: print-in-schedule
parameters.description: Whether the class includes any sections that are to be printed in the Schedule of Classes

get.summary: Get allowable code/descriptor pairs for class related fields
get.description: Returns field names and the canonical coded values and descriptions allowed for them, in the format of the Common/FieldValueList EDO described on [bMeta.berkeley.edu](http://bMeta.berkeley.edu)

parameters.name: field-name
parameters.description: The name of a particular coded field, expressed in dot notation (e.g., "class.status"). If this parameter is omitted, all class related fields and value lists are returned.

get.description:
Returns class section data, consisting of the Student/Class Section EDO described on [bMeta.berkeley.edu](http://bMeta.berkeley.edu)
***Note:** At least one of cs-course-id or term-id query parameters is required.*

parameters.name: cs-course-id
parameters.description: The unique id for a canonical course in Campus Solutions

parameters.name: term-id
parameters.description: The ID uniquely identifying the term

parameters.name: subject-area-code
parameters.description: The area of academic inquiry, such as MATH or ENGLISH

parameters.name: catalog-number
parameters.description: The human-readable number identifying a class within a subject area, such as R1A

parameters.name: session-id
parameters.description: The ID uniquely identifying a session within the term

parameters.name: class-number
parameters.description: The index uniquely identifying the class among those with the specified subject area and catalog number

parameters.name: section-number
parameters.description: The index uniquely identifying the section among those associated with the same class

parameters.name: component-code
parameters.description: The code representing the type of section, e.g., LEC

parameters.name: include-secondary
parameters.description: Whether to return class sections where primary = false

parameters.name: meets-days
parameters.description: A concatination of the first two characters of the day names to include, e.g., MoWeFr

parameters.name: start-time
parameters.description: The time at or after which the class meeting begins (in HH:MM:SS format where HH is 00-24, and :SS is optional)

parameters.name: end-time
parameters.description: The time at or before which the class meeting ends (in HH:MM:SS format where HH is 00-24, and :SS is optional)

parameters.name: instructor-id
parameters.description: The instructor's ID number in Campus Solutions

parameters.name: instructor-campus-uid
parameters.description: The instructor's CalNet UID number

parameters.name: instructor-family-name
parameters.description: The instructor's last name

parameters.name: status-code
parameters.description: The code indicating whether the class section is active or otherwise

parameters.name: enrollment-status-code
parameters.description: The code indicating whether the class section is open for enrollment

parameters.name: waitlist-availability
parameters.description: Return only class sections having a waitlist, whether open or full

parameters.name: final-exam-code
parameters.description: The code indicating whether and what kind of final exam is required

parameters.name: instruction-mode-code
parameters.description: The code indicating whether the class section is offered in-person or over the web

parameters.name: fees-exist
parameters.description: Whether the class section requires any additional fees

parameters.name: print-in-schedule
parameters.description: Whether the class section is to be printed in the Schedule of Classes

parameters.name: release-status
parameters.description: [TBD]
